name: marina-psychology-monorepo
description: Монорепозиторий для персонального психологического кабинета Марины Чикаидзе

scripts.install:all: npm install && npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.install:frontend: cd frontend/main-site && npm install && cd ../admin-panel && npm install
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:backend" "npm run start:main-site" "npm run start:admin"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:main-site" "npm run dev:admin"
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend/main-site && npm run build && cd ../admin-panel && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.test:frontend: cd frontend/main-site && npm test && cd ../admin-panel && npm test
scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend/main-site && npm run lint && cd ../admin-panel && npm run lint
scripts.clean: rimraf backend/node_modules frontend/main-site/node_modules frontend/admin-panel/node_modules backend/dist frontend/main-site/build frontend/admin-panel/build logs tmp temp-backup

author: Marina Chikaidze
